artist: Photographer: Jeremiah Gurney; Publisher: J. Ward & Son
description: American actress; full-length portrait of a woman in profile from PR side with head turned to PR leaning against rustic fence in front of a studio exterior backdrop; woman wears a light-colored hat with veil in back and long dark dress with elaborate fringe and trimmings
markings: [MISS CLARA LOUISE KELLOGG./Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1868, by J. GURNEY & SON, in the Clerk\'s Office of the District/Court of the United States, for the/Southern District of New York.], printed in black, below image; [J. Gurney & Son 707 Broadway N.Y.], printed, in brown, at corners below inscription in black; [J.WARD & SON/PUBLISHERS/125 WASHINGTON ST/BOSTON/MASS],in black, on a scrolling ribbon, on back at top center; [CARTE IMPERIALE/BY/J. GURNEY & SON/707 BROADWAY, N.Y.], in black, surrounded by decorative lines and scrolls, at center on back
title: Miss Clara Louise Kellogg (1842-1916)
